TextView.android:text: 1 Brief Forms Here is an additional set of nine concise forms for widely used words. Make sure to study them thoroughly!
• The word ‘be’ is also found at the start of words like ‘believe’ and ‘because.’
2 Words Ending -ly The frequently used ending-ly is signified by the e circle.

• Notice that in the word ‘highly,’ the small circle representing ‘-ly’ is placed within the larger circle; in the case of ‘daily,’ it is appended on the opposite side of the ‘d’ after the ‘a’ has been inscribed.
3 Amounts and Quantities When you take dictation in the office setting, you often need to record figures and measurements. Here are a few techniques that will help you write them quickly.
• Notice that the 'n' for hundred and the 'ith' for thousand are positioned below the number.
